name: Constellations (Gorglomux)
description:
How To Play :

Move around with right click. You can zoom and dezoom too.

Click on a constellation name to start building it. On the build menu you can drag the red nodes around using left click. Once placed on the area, you can move them with your middle mouse click.

You can link nodes using left click, but be careful as 2 link can't cross themselves !

In order to be fully built, you must put the correct amount of links as indicated by the number on the nodes. 

Feeling stuck ? Press the refresh button at any time !

Made for the Ludum Dare 45. Link of the project here :  https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/$16409164091
Additionnal node: if the brower version takes too long to load, you can download it on Windows as well.
